output: rmarkdown::html_vignette

  %\VignetteIndexEntry{Multiple comparisons: Holm vs BH vs Hochberg}
  %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown}

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
```

```{r}
library(mcnemarControl)

dat <- mcnemar_example_long(seed = 2)
trts <- c("TrtA", "TrtB", "TrtC")

summary(mcnemar_control(dat, "id", "condition", "outcome", control = "Control", treatments = trts, p_adjust = "holm"))
summary(mcnemar_control(dat, "id", "condition", "outcome", control = "Control", treatments = trts, p_adjust = "BH"))
summary(mcnemar_control(dat, "id", "condition", "outcome", control = "Control", treatments = trts, p_adjust = "hochberg"))
```
